name: Marabout Run
description:
A marabout runs through the jungle and the savannah because his wife asks him to bring him a list of ingredients.

To reach his sweetheart on time, he will have to dodge many traps by transforming into a mouse or a giraffe.

This 3D runner-type game was produced in 48 hours during the GDL game jam with a team of four people.

The game was designed with Unity and the 3D graphics were modeled with 3Dsmax.

Team :

Antoine Paviat : C# develloper and environment artist
